message:
D23, the ultimate Disney fan event for 2024, unveiled a plethora of exciting announcements for Disney Parks and beyond. Here are some key highlights:

1. **First-Ever Coco Ride**: In a thrilling revelation, Disney announced the first-ever "Coco" ride, which will be featured at Disney California Adventure. This attraction is expected to bring the vibrant world of Pixar's "Coco" to life, immersing guests in the music, colors, and culture of the beloved film.

   [Learn more about the Coco ride here.](https://disneyparksblog.com/dlr/coco-ride-announced-california-adventure/)

2. **Avatar Updates for Disney California Adventure**: Disney California Adventure will be expanding its offerings with new updates related to James Cameron's "Avatar." This will likely enhance the park's immersive experiences, building upon the success of Pandora – The World of Avatar at Disney's Animal Kingdom in Florida.

   [Discover more about the Avatar updates here.](https://disneyparksblog.com/dlr/avatar-experience-announced-california-adventure/)

3. **New Nighttime Parade at Magic Kingdom**: Walt Disney World Resort will introduce a new nighttime parade at Magic Kingdom. This addition promises to be a spectacular display of lights, music, and floats, adding an extra layer of magic to the nighttime experience at the park.

   [Find out more about the new nighttime parade here.](https://disneyparksblog.com/wdw/new-nighttime-parade-magic-kingdom/)

4. **D23 Mousequerade**: The 2024 D23 Mousequerade showcased some of the most creative Disney costumes, with photos and winners being announced. This event always brings out the best in Disney fandom and creativity.

   [Check out the photos and winners here.](https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/photos-and-winners-of-the-2024-d23-mousequerade-the-ultimate-disney-costume-contest/)

5. **Imagineering: Behind the Dreams Pavilion**: Attendees got a first look at the “Imagineering: Behind the Dreams” Pavilion, offering an inside scoop on the creative processes behind Disney's most ambitious projects. This pavilion is a must-see for those interested in the magic behind the scenes.

   [Take a first look at the pavilion here.](https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/imagineering-behind-the-dreams-pavilion-at-d23/)

These announcements are just the tip of the iceberg, with many more details to come as Disney continues to innovate and expand its offerings. As Disney Experiences Chairman Josh D’Amaro emphasized, "we are doing everything you’ve heard here tonight," signaling a bright and exciting future for Disney Parks worldwide.
